title: Lost a champion and skin
body:
Had Ashe and the Marauder skin, went to use Ashe last night and after a few games of not being able to find her in the list I realized that it's because she's completely missing from my list.

So I went to the store and it's asking me to purchase her, and the Marauder skin (which was gifted to me).
So, yeah how to fix?

replies.body:
Hi,

I think in this case it is probably best you send in a [support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  They will be able to take a look into your account to help work out why the skin is missing.

Cheers
Mindstar
